verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Father, You know me and You love me
Oh Father, I was made to give You glory

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And like a jar of sweet perfume
I will give my life to You
All my love, poured out on the feet of the Lord

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus, there is no one like You
Oh Jesus, I am longing to be with You

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Spirit, fill me with your love again
Holy Spirit, come and lead me into truth again
